entry.title: Monday night: Rain. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Rain ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Fog patches developing late this evening. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming east 40 gusting to 60 early this evening then diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 5:15 PM ADT Monday 1 May 2023
